sentences.english: The coloured drawing on the ceiling of that old house is beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 那座老房子的彩繪承塵很漂亮。

sentences.english: Color transfer printing of T-shirt is one of process of textile printing.
sentences.chinese: 彩繪轉印是T恤圖案印花工藝中的一種。

sentences.english: Some objects of refined terracotta were decorated with zoomorphic and geometric designs.
sentences.chinese: 細泥陶上常有彩繪的幾何圖案或動物形花紋。

sentences.english: Best one should be Jingdezhen kiln, have the glaze and decoration.
sentences.chinese: 以景德鎮窯製品最佳，有各色釉和彩繪裝飾。

sentences.english: It is illegal to paint sparrows to sell them as parakeets .
sentences.chinese: 將麻雀彩繪成鸚哥出售是違法的。

sentences.english: "Pity wins coloured drawing or pattern, as rich and gaudy with good name who make rose".
sentences.chinese: “濃豔盡憐勝彩繪，佳名誰贈作玫瑰”。

sentences.english: The interior of the church is divided into 3 naves .
sentences.chinese: 堂內爲三通廊式，內牆彩繪壁畫，裝飾華麗。

sentences.english: Its beams bear colored paintings illustrating the story about Fan the Small Man.
sentences.chinese: 亭內橫樑上彩繪“範小人”傳奇故事。

sentences.english: The Fengxiang folk art is colorful, among which the colored drawing on pottery clay sculpture bears the richest style.
sentences.chinese: 鳳翔民間藝術豐富多彩，以彩繪泥塑最具風格。

sentences.english: Beautiful gold murals are located under each eave of the compound.
sentences.chinese: 整個大院所有房間的屋檐下部都有漂亮的真金彩繪。

sentences.english: I might see some peeling paint on an old wall and photograph it.
sentences.chinese: 我也許看見一面老牆上剝落的彩繪就拍了下來。

sentences.english: Its beams bear colored paintings illustrating the story about Sun Bin and Pang Juan.
sentences.chinese: 榭內橫樑上彩繪歷史上著名的“孫龐鬥智”故事。

sentences.english: Tourist train of Hsi-Hu Sugar Factory was running back to the plant.
sentences.chinese: 溪湖糖廠駛回廠區的彩繪觀光小火車。

sentences.english: The brightly colored paintings literally shimmer with inlaid gold and lapis.
sentences.chinese: 彩繪鑲嵌着黃金和寶石，隨着光亮層層閃爍。

sentences.english: The aluminum can be anodized in a solid color or with patterns and pictures.
sentences.chinese: 鋁可以通過陽極電鍍形成單一顏色或圖案彩繪。

sentences.english: Its beams bear colored paintings illustrating a legend about the Mother Buddha Cave.
sentences.chinese: 亭內橫樑上彩繪觀音洞傳說故事。

definition: colored lantern (used at Lantern Festival 元宵節|元宵节)
to arrange/to set out/to decorate/to display/decorative items
